page.title: 03KINGSKERSWELL VILLAGE.
page.content: Kingskerswell village is convenient,as it is close to the sea and the moors. There are quite a few amenities in the village,ranging from Playschool to Whist Drive.We have a fine Playing Field where different sports are played during the year,just wish the drainage was better.We also have the Downs where you can enjoy a country walk.The Village does not have many shops so most people shop in the larger towns. We have no clothes shops only provisions and hair_dressers.We have four Churches,Methodist,United Reformed,Church of England and Catholic.We have a very nice Health Centre and very soon a new Primary School will be opened.On the whole I like the Village and wouldn't like to see too much changed.Maybe a Village Fete once a year where all age groups can go. By M.Hunter.
